Purchase Committee

SDA Purchase Committee has been re-constituted vide SDA Order No. SDA/VC/476 dated 04/03/2020 and comprises of following officers:

S.NoMemberDesignation
1Director Land Management Chairman
2Financial Advisor/CAO Member
3Joint Director (M&P) Industries & CommerceMember
4Dy. Director, Enforcement Member
5Executive EngineerMember
6Administrative OfficerMember Secretary
